name: io.github.jonnybottles/azure-updates
description: MCP server for Azure Updates RSS feed - search, filter, and summarize Azure service updates

tools.name: azure_updates_search
tools.description: Search and filter Azure updates by keyword, category, status, date range, or GUID

tools.name: azure_updates_summarize
tools.description: Get statistical overview and trends of Azure updates

tools.name: azure_updates_list_categories
tools.description: List all available Azure service categories
